data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: If drawing from a chair form, all groups on top of the chair become the groups on top of the Haworth projection ring. The ____ way ____ find ____ these ____ is ____ choose ____ axial ____ that ____ above ____ ring ____ then ____ around ____ ring, alternating ____ and ____ positions. In the picture on the right, all the groups attached to red bonds would go on top of the ring the Haworth projection and all the groups attached to the blue bonds would go below.
data.partBlankContent: If drawing from a chair form, all groups on top of the chair become the groups on top of the Haworth projection ring. The eas____ way t_ find a__ these gro___ is t_ choose a_ axial posi____ that i_ above t__ ring a__ then g_ around t__ ring, alternating ax___ and equat_____ positions. In the picture on the right, all the groups attached to red bonds would go on top of the ring the Haworth projection and all the groups attached to the blue bonds would go below.
data.answer: 如果从一个椅子的形式，所有组在椅子上成为霍沃斯投影环上的组。找到所有这些基团的最简单的方法是选择一个环上方的轴向位置，然后绕环旋转，交替轴向和赤道位置。在右边的图中，所有与红色键相连的基团都在霍沃斯投影环的上方所有与蓝色键相连的基团都在环的下方。
